html: I urged @NOAA to study gaps in its NEXRAD coverage for #WatfordCity. html: June 1969, USS Frank E. Evans collides w/ Australian aircraft carrier, killing 74 American sailors. Collision happened outside designated combat zone, so sailors’ names weren’t added to #VietnamVeterans Memorial. I’ve introduced amendment to NDAA to rectify this.pic.twitter.com/13MgBL8MOZ
text: June 1969, USS Frank E. Evans collides w/ Australian aircraft carrier, killing 74 American sailors. Collision happened outside designated combat zone, so sailors’ names weren’t added to #VietnamVeterans Memorial. I’ve introduced amendment to NDAA to rectify this.pic.twitter.com/13MgBL8MOZ
